quote: Even if you have never had any bad issues with this, please use my example to tell your buyers the importance of changing the locks as soon as the property records.
why_clipworthy: The personal story highlights a critical safety tip that resonates with listeners.
suggested_hook: Why changing the locks immediately after closing could save you from a nightmare.

quote: The amount of agents that help other agents is very small. Anything that we can do to help each other out, it will come back to you.
why_clipworthy: Promotes a collaborative mindset among real estate agents.
suggested_hook: Why helping fellow agents can boost your own success.
